MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY3 postcode area of Burntisland, affecting properties in High Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.48am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault close to the Burntisland Town substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.45pm on the 2nd of February 2021.
